I am passionate about uncovering actionable insights from complex datasets and leveraging statistical modeling, machine learning, and data visualization to solve real-world problems. My goal is to become a skilled data analyst or data scientist, continually expanding my technical expertise and contributing meaningful data-driven solutions. Feel free to connect with me—I look forward to collaborating and discovering new ways to harness the power of data.
